attributes.action: recommend to Her Majesty the dissolution of the House of Commons to enable voters to restore public confidence by electing a new House.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The revelations about MPs' expenses are undermining confidence in Parliament and are interfering with the machinery and efficiency of Government. The only satisfactory way to restore confidence is to afford voters an immediate opportunity to elect a fresh House.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
